concept.title: Sound Driver
concept.shortdesc: Describes how to create a port of the sound driver for your phone hardware.

conbody.p: The Sound Driver is a device driver that controls the audio hardware of a phone. Symbian platform provides a User-Side API, a Logical Device Driver, and a base class for physical channels. You must provide a PDD that implements the physical channels that interface to the sound hardware on your phone.
